site_name: Land At Binsey Walk Adjacent ToHarrow ManorwayLondon
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Application to approve details of conditions 4 (Sequence Plan) and 13(Construction Management Plan) pursuant to application 16/01287/OUTM for Outline application for demolition of existing buildings and hard standing, residential development of up to 329 units and up to 1,050 sq metres of commercial floorspace (with flexible uses across classes A1 - A4 (retail, financial and professional services, caf√© and restaurants) and B1a (office) and D1 (community uses) and D2 (Boat Club),  with all matters reserved, and associated works including, informal and formal open space, internal road network; landscaping; car and cycle parking; waste storage.
